name: Disguises Everywhere
description:
Disguises Everywhere is a game set in a world taken over by evil robots, whom had imprisoned humanity.

One day, certain human individuals had developed powers due to radiations generated from robots, one of them is a Master of Disguise.

Press W-A-S-D to move, click to morph into enemies, R to Restart, C to Enable Symbols, press buttons to open doors, touch the exit to win.

Submission for Dani Basement Jam #4.

ALL AUDIO BELONGS TO DJ-AfterBurnz

There is an obscure reference in the name.
